cards.name: Abduction
cards.ruleText: Mark target creature. Move the marked card to a city or army controlled by its owner.

cards.name: Crumbling Defenses
cards.ruleText: Sacrifice all Dark Legion creatures in your army. For each sacrificed creature, target player discards a card or sacrifices a resource card.

cards.name: Dark Portal
cards.ruleText: M, Each city you control loses 1 defense point. Move target creature without marking it.

cards.name: Fear of the Dark
cards.ruleText: Target creature cannot attack Dark Legion cities, nor can it defend against Dark Legion creatures.

cards.name: Fearless Assault
cards.ruleText: All creatures have deadly until end of turn and all Undead creatures are immune to deadly until end of turn.

cards.name: Forgiving Vampire
cards.ruleText: Flying - Creatures without flying cannot stop me. Lose 1 defense point on a city: either target creature gets -1/-1 and I get +1/+1, or vice versa.

cards.name: Foul Imps
cards.ruleText: I get +1/+1 for each other Imp in play.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.ruleText: Sudden - I can be played directly into your army.

cards.name: Gigantic Spider
cards.ruleText: When I die, target player discards a card or sacrifices a resource card.

cards.name: Jevyan's Advice
cards.ruleText: Sacrifice a city you control; destroy all creatures and enchantments.

cards.name: Lobotomized Library
cards.ruleText: Level 3: All players discard two cards. Level 5: Draw a card. Level 7: Each time an opponent draws a card, deal 2 damage to one of that opponent's cities.

cards.name: Nightgaunt
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. When I come into play, target player discards a card or sacrifices a resource card.

cards.name: Nirvana of the Undead
cards.ruleText: Level 3: All Undead creatures become deadly. Level 5: Whenever a non-undead creature you control would be put into a graveyard from play, you may put it in your army instead. That creature gains the type Undead.

cards.name: Out of Nowhere
cards.ruleText: Search your deck for a Dark Legion card and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

cards.name: Raise the Undead
cards.ruleText: Search any graveyard and put target creature in your army. That creature has the "Undead" type next to its other types.

cards.name: Rotten Deal
cards.ruleText: Target player either discards two cards, or sacrifices two resource cards, or discards one card and sacrifices one resource card.

cards.name: Shadow in the Dark
cards.ruleText: Infiltrate - I can move into opponents' cities. M, put a -1/-1 counter on me: destroy target creature in the same city.

cards.name: Shadow's Twilight
cards.ruleText: Level 2: When an opponent discards a card, he/she chooses one of his/her cities. That city gets 1 damage. Level 5: Shadow creatures you control are indestructible.

cards.name: Shatis
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. When I damage a city, that player or that city's owner discards a card or sacrifices a resource card.

cards.name: Undead Archer
cards.ruleText: Ranged - I can defend against creatures with flying. M, Deal 1 damage to target creature or city.

cards.name: Wight
cards.ruleText: When I'm in the graveyard and there are three cards on top of me, target player discards a card or sacrifices a resource card, then I am put on top of your graveyard.

cards.name: Botanist
cards.ruleText: Peaceful. M Sacrifice two resource cards: prevent a Tree or Flower from dying. Mark the saved card.

cards.name: Call to Aid
cards.ruleText: Residents of target city you control can help defend another city you control until end of turn.

cards.name: Crop Token
cards.ruleText: M, Sacrifice me to produce 1 Gaian resource.

cards.name: Early Spring
cards.ruleText: Each Tree or Flower creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each Gaian city gains 2 defense points.

cards.name: Elvish Ambush
cards.ruleText: Creatures defending against me get -1/-1 until end of turn. M, deal 1 damage to target creature or city.

cards.name: Elvish Archer
cards.ruleText: When I come into play my city gains 2 defense points. All elves in play gain ranged. Ranged - I can defend against creatures with flying.

cards.name: Falconer
cards.ruleText: M, Sacrifice two resource cards: prevent a Bird from dying. Mark the saved card. Birds in your hand, deck and graveyard have sudden.

cards.name: Farmland
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Put a 0/1 crop token into play as my resident. It has "M, Sacrifice to produce 1 Gaian resource" and counts as a Flower. Level 4: Your Flowers and Trees get +1/+3.

cards.name: Grassroots
cards.ruleText: Put x grassroot counters on target creature and mark it. Each time the creature is marked, add 1 grassroot counter. Target creature does not unmark unless its controller pays 1 for each grassroot counter.

cards.name: Kolibri
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. M, Produce 1 Gaian resource or produce 2 Gaian resources if you control at least a flower.

cards.name: Majestic Griffin
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. Veteran - I am not marked for attacking.

cards.name: Nature's Outrage
cards.ruleText: All trees and flowers with peaceful can attack this turn as though they didn't have peaceful.

cards.name: Nightingale
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. When I mark for devotion, mark target creature. That creature doesn't unmark during its controller's next unmark phase.

cards.name: Nourished Flower
cards.ruleText: Peaceful - I cannot attack. I gain a +1/+1 counter every time you play a Gaian card.

cards.name: Poison Ivy
cards.ruleText: Peaceful - I cannot attack. Each time I damage a creature it gets an additional  "I do not unmark unless my controller puts a -1/-1 counter on me."

cards.name: Sanctuary
cards.ruleText: Level 3: All my residents have sanctuary. Level 5: All residents in your cities have sanctuary. Level 7: All creatures in your army have sanctuary.

cards.name: Sequoia Saplings
cards.ruleText: For each other Gaian card in the same city or army, I get +0/+1. If my defense reaches 5 I have ranged and can block creatures with flying.  Peaceful - I cannot attack.

cards.name: Spirit Tree
cards.ruleText: Level 3: You may put a creature from your graveyard in your army. Remove it from the game at the start of your next turn. Level 7: You may put a creature from your graveyard in play as one of my residents.

cards.name: Archivist
cards.ruleText: When I am marked, put the top card of each player's deck into his/her graveyard.

cards.name: Benevolent Baron
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, each player draws a card. When I leave play, each player discards a card.

cards.name: Binding Contract
cards.ruleText: When its controller marks target enchanted creature all other creatures in the same city or army are also marked.

cards.name: Blindfolded
cards.ruleText: Target creature gains: "m, mark target creature. It doesn't unmark as long as I am marked. You may choose not to unmark me during your unmark phase."

cards.name: Carpe Diem
cards.ruleText: Mark target creature. You may pay an additional x resources to mark x additional creatures.

cards.name: Entangled
cards.ruleText: Target creature doesn't unmark during its controller's unmark phase.

cards.name: Erode
cards.ruleText: Counter target spell or destroy target enchantment. Each opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Esteemed Councilor
cards.ruleText: When I mark for devotion, you may pay 2 to draw a card. My devotion towards the city counts double.

cards.name: Esteemed Duelist
cards.ruleText: First Strike - In combat, deal damage first. The opposing creature only strikes back if it survives. Blood Vengeance - I come into play with x +1/+0 counters, where x is equal to the damage dealt the previous turn by target opposing creature.

cards.name: Merchant Ship
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. When I am moved, you may move target creature along. We are both not marked for moving.

cards.name: Prince of Thieves
cards.ruleText: M Look at the top card of target player's deck. 2: Target player puts the top card of his/her deck into his/her graveyard.

cards.name: Qualaris
cards.ruleText: You may remove House of Nobles cards from your graveyard from the game. The removed cards' loyalty marks add to my devotion. Level 5: Move target creature to a city of the creature's controller. Moving the creature doesn't cause it to mark.

cards.name: Royal Guard
cards.ruleText: Bodyguard 3 - Each turn I may divert up to 3 damage from target creature you control and put that damage on myself instead.

cards.name: Siphon
cards.ruleText: Level 3: Players can only have x resource cards. X is the number of resource cards you control. Level 7: Players can only unmark x creatures during their unmark phase. X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Touch of Genius
cards.ruleText: Choose one: target player can't draw cards this turn, or target player must draw three cards.

cards.name: Two Bridges
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Target player puts the top card of his/her deck into his/her graveyard. Level 4: Draw a card. Level 6: Target player puts the top card of his/her deck into his/her graveyard.

cards.name: Whirlwind
cards.ruleText: Return target creature to the top of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Besieged City
cards.ruleText: All movement to or from target city is forbidden as long as your army has more creatures than the city's controller's army.

cards.name: Big Brother
cards.ruleText: When I attack a city where Little Brother is, I deal 2 additional damage to that city.

cards.name: Cutpurse Imp
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, steal one resource card from target player and put it under your control. The card retains its resource type and its marked / unmarked state. When I leave play, return the stolen resource card.

cards.name: Deadly Shock
cards.ruleText: Deal 3 damage to target creature or deal 2 damage to target city.

cards.name: Imp Union Leader
cards.ruleText: If you control at least 2 other Imps, all your Imps get +2/+0 during your turn and get +0/+2 during any opponent's turn.

cards.name: Little Brother
cards.ruleText: Infiltrate - I can move into opponents' cities. I deal 1 damage to the city in which I reside at the beginning of that city's tactics phase.

cards.name: Misled Orc
cards.ruleText: When I die, deal 1 damage to target creature or city.

cards.name: Orc Drummer
cards.ruleText: Mark: All orcs in your army get a +1/+0 counter. Use this ability only when I am in your army as well.

cards.name: Orc Recruiter
cards.ruleText: Mark: Put a 1/1 Orc creature token into your army marked.

cards.name: Orc Rouser
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, unmark target creature.

cards.name: Orc Scout
cards.ruleText: Infiltrate - I can  move into opponents' cities. When I enter a city, that city's owner reveals one card at random from their hand.

cards.name: Orc Thug
cards.ruleText: Infiltrate - I can move into opponents' cities. Mark: Deal 2 damage to target creature in the same city as me.

cards.name: Orc Warleader
cards.ruleText: Unique - No player can control more than one of me at any time. Orcs you control get +1/+0.

cards.name: Outmaneuvered
cards.ruleText: Until end of turn, target army cannot defend target city.

cards.name: Second Sons' Army Camp
cards.ruleText: Level 3: All creatures in your army get +2/+2. Level 5: All creatures in your army have overrun.

cards.name: Tunnel Network
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Produce 2 Red Banner resources. Level 4: All creatures in your cities gain travel. (Creatures with travel are not bound by the move limit. Level 7: All creatures in your hand gain sudden.

cards.name: Warren
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Put a 1/1 Orc token into your army marked. Level 5: Put a 3/3 Orc token into your army marked.

cards.name: Wild Warg
cards.ruleText: I deal 2 damage to each creature defending against me.

cards.name: Witchdoctor
cards.ruleText: When I mark for devotion, I give a creature in your army a rabies counter. (Creatures with rabies must attack each turn if able. Any creature damaged by a creature with rabies gains rabies. At the end of a player's turn, they must sacrifice all creatures with rabies.)

cards.name: Wolf Rider
cards.ruleText: Sudden - I can be played directly into your army. When I die, put a 1/1 Orc creature token into your army.

cards.name: Armory
cards.ruleText: Level 2: Your Soldiers get +1/+1. Level 4: Your Soldiers have first strike. (Creatures with first strike deal damage first in combat. The opposing creature only gets to strike back if it survives.)

cards.name: Assemble the Army
cards.ruleText: Move all unmarked Soldiers from your cities into your army. The Soldiers are not marked for moving.

cards.name: Barracks
cards.ruleText: Level 3: Your Soldiers cost 1 less to play. Level 5: Put a Soldier from your hand into your army.

cards.name: Battering Ram
cards.ruleText: All Soldiers you control get +2/+0 and have overrun until end of turn.

cards.name: Bearer
cards.ruleText: Whenever I deal damage to a city, you may put a Soldier from your hand into a city you control. First Strike - I deal damage first. The opposing creature only strikes back if it survives.

cards.name: Borg's Keep
cards.ruleText: Level 1: Sacrifice a resource card for every creature you control. Level 3: After your combat phase, unmark all creatures in your army and have a second combat phase.

cards.name: Conscript
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may search your deck and reveal any number of Soldiers. Shuffle your deck and put the soldiers on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Dimensional Pocket
cards.ruleText: Choose one: deal 1 damage to a target city, or deal 3 damage to 1 target creature, or deal 1 damage to 3 target creatures.

cards.name: Footsoldier
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may pay 1 for each Footsoldier in play. If you do pay, then search your deck for a Footsolidier and put it into your army. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Mentor
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, you may search your deck for a soldier and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Mercenary
cards.ruleText: First Strike - In combat, I deal damage first. The opposing creature only strikes back if it survives. Sudden - I can be played directly into your army. If I have attacked this turn, put me in the graveyard during your discard phase.

cards.name: Mounted Eagle
cards.ruleText: Flying - Only creatures with flying and ranged can defend against me. I get +2/+1 when blocking creatures without flying.

cards.name: Revenge
cards.ruleText: Creatures you play this turn have blood vengeance (they come into play with x +1/+0 counters, where x is equal to the damage dealt the previous turn by target opposing creature). Salvage 5 - You may pay 5 resources to return me to your hand from the graveyard.

cards.name: Seat of the Throne
cards.ruleText: Target city gains 3 defense points and can only sustain 1 damage each turn. Destroy all other cities you control.

cards.name: Spearman
cards.ruleText: All unmarked Soldiers in your army must attack during your combat phase. Battle Scream 1 - When I attack, all other attacking creatures get +1/+0.

cards.name: Squad Leader
cards.ruleText: When I come into play, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put each revealed Soldier in your hand and put any other card on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.ruleText: m, Mark two Soldiers you control, deal 5 damage to target creature. The marked Soldiers and I do not unmark in your next two unmark phases.
